# Small bar chart

A small bar chart template.

## Web (responsive)

<Preview>
  <Story name="Web (responsive)">
    <SmallBarChart
      paddingBetweenLabels={8}
      paddingAfterLabels={8}
      margin={{ top: 30, bottom: 30, left: 0, right: 0 }}
      height={120}
      width={300}
      data={[
        { refPosition: 'Leave', vote: 26.3 },
        { refPosition: 'Remain', vote: 76.4 },
      ]}
      xVariable="vote"
      yVariable="refPosition"
      colorScale={(d) => (d === 'Leave' ? '#33302e' : 'rgba(153, 145, 137, 0.8)')}
      colorVariable="refPosition"
    />
  </Story>
</Preview>
